arcade.env.comp

Class DegradeComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.DegradeComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class DegradeComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    Implementation of Component for degrading edges.

    This component can only be used with GraphSites. The wall thickness of edges that are adjacent to a location with cancerous cells is decreased (DEGRADATION_RATE). Edges that are below a minimum wall thickness and have a shear stress below the shear threshold (SHEAR_THRESHOLD) are removed from the graph. At the end of a step, if no edges have been removed from the graph, then only the stresses in the graph are recalculated. Otherwise, all hemodynamic properties are recalculated.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.8
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DegradeComponent

        public DegradeComponent(MiniBox component)
        Creates a Component object for degradation.

        Specifications include:

        • DEGRADATION_RATE = rate of wall thickness degradation
        • SHEAR_THRESHOLD = shear threshold for vessel collapse
        Parameters:
        component - the parsed component attributes
